body:
The top of this rosewood shaft narrows and then expands again, bound by a number of metal rings. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Bear's endurance (1 charge)
  • Bull's strength (1 charge)
  • Cat's grace (1 charge)
  • Greater magic weapon (1 charge)
name: Staff of Bolstering
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Bolstering
